thread.section_title: Express Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Express Insurance | expressinsurance.com.au
thread.title: Ashish - Chawla Group
thread.title_full: Express Insurance reviewed by Ashish - Chawla Group

author: Ashish - Chawla Group
title: Ashish - Chawla Group
text:
Richard took time in understanding our situation and the business structure and assisted with solutions that no other insurance brokers such as bizcover.com.au seemed to be bothered enough to take out time, listen and assist.
We highly recommend Express Insurance. The fact and assurance that you can always talk to a real person and get personalised attention is a huge peace of mind. Also saved us significant money.
